summary: A varied group of passengers boarding a ship bound for pre-WWII Germany represents a microcosm of early 1930s society.
cast: Vivien Leigh|Simone Signoret|José Ferrer|Lee Marvin|Oskar Werner|Elizabeth Ashley|George Segal|José Greco|Michael Dunn|Charles Korvin|Heinz Rühmann|Lilia Skala|BarBara Luna|Christiane Schmidtmer|Alf Kjellin|Werner Klemperer|John Wengraf|Olga Fabian|Gila Golan|Oscar Beregi Jr.|Stanley Adams|Kaaren Verne|Charles De Vries|Lydia Torea|Henry Calvin|Paul Daniel|David Renard|Rudy Carrela|Silvia Marino|Anthony Brand|John Alvar|Antonio|Eddie Baker|Vicki Cos|Walter Friedel|Steven Geray|Peter Mamakos|Charles H. Radilak|Rosario|Bert Rumsey|Jesse Wayne
title: El barco de los locos
